intro: Callisace ruthenica, commonly known as the Ruthenian sandwort, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia. Its leaves are narrow and linear, adapted to withstand arid and rocky environments. Callisace ruthenica is often found in steppes and dry meadows, where it plays a role in stabilizing soil and supporting local biodiversity.
